roleset.name: fragility

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is brittle, if in addition to arg1

example.name: brittle-j
example.text: The recommended variety was brittle in character and farmers voiced concern if one or two leaves were prematurely broken by the wind.

example.name: brittleness-n
example.text: Using the brittleness of materials as a mechanical property.

roleset.note: BRITTLENESS-N, BRITTLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.
